message:
fix: dev-1631: handle-open-polygon (#517)

* if polygon is open on toolswitch close polygon

* on tool change run handle tool change if available to delete unclosed polygons

* Fix scenario when there's no area being drawn

* Fix ctrl-z in tests

* remove logging

* close polygon if closeable else clear state

* Try to revert image in tests

Co-authored-by: Travis Clark <“travisjosephclark@gmail.com”>
Co-authored-by: Nick Skriabin <nr@fenelon.ru>
Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
